column1: '''Hannah Blessing Wood''' (b. [[1983]]) is a poet, and also the sister of [[Elijah Wood]]. She appeared in minor roles without lines in two of her brother's movies,

column2: Radio Flyer]]'' and ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]'', where she played a girl sheltering in the [[Glittering Caves]].
